subject: Update documentation to reflect current implementation status
body:
**What Changed:**
- Updated app.json to use coin-zapp branding (removed template references)
- Created .env.example with correct environment variable names
- Rewrote README.md to clearly separate implemented vs planned features
- Updated docs/HISTORY.md with all 5 commits from git history
- Added current status sections to docs/TODO.md and docs/Koinz_Setup_Guide.md
- Added implementation status section to claude.md

**Why:**
- Documentation was describing the target state as if fully implemented
- Template artifacts (expo-supabase-starter) needed to be replaced
- Environment variable naming was inconsistent between code and docs
- Missing .env.example file that README referenced
- Needed clear distinction between what exists vs what's planned

**Impact:**
- Developers can now see actual project status at a glance
- Setup instructions are accurate and won't cause confusion
- Documentation links are corrected
- Git history is properly documented in HISTORY.md

**Files Changed:**
- app.json: Updated branding and bundle identifiers
- .env.example: Created with correct variable names
- README.md: Added status section, fixed structure, corrected links
- docs/HISTORY.md: Documented all 5 commits with context
- docs/TODO.md: Added current status overview
- docs/Koinz_Setup_Guide.md: Added setup progress tracker
- claude.md: Added implementation status warnings
title: Update documentation to reflect current implementation status
